title: Here's Your First Taste Of SNOT With Their New Vocalist
description: Still no idea who they are.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 6 hours ago
excerpt: Still no idea who they are.
text: The reunited Snot – currently guitarists Mikey Doling and Sonny Mayo, bassist John "Tumor" Fahnestock, drummer Jamie Miller, and a mystery vocalist – is set to take the stage for the first time on January 17 at the House Of Blues Anaheim in Anaheim, CA. While Snot is purposefully keeping the identity of their new vocalist a secret until then, you can hear the mystery man in action below. Whoever they are is sounds pretty damn good (for at least those few seconds), so this is certainly exciting! Snot's current tour dates for 2025 are: 1/17 Anaheim, CA House Of Blues Anaheim (w/ Adema & Sicksense)1/18 San Diego, CA Brick By Brick (w/ Adema & Sicksense)2/08 Santa Barbara, CA SOhO (w/ Seven Hours After Violet & Petmedz)4/25 Denver, CO HQ4/26 Colorado Springs, CO The Black Sheep5/18 Daytona Beach, FL Welcome To Rockville8/8-10 Kortrijk, BEL Alcatraz8/14-17 Carhaix, FRA Motocultor Festival Want More Metal? html:
The reunited Snot – currently guitarists Mikey Doling and Sonny Mayo, bassist John "Tumor" Fahnestock, drummer Jamie Miller, and a mystery vocalist – is set to take the stage for the first time on January 17 at the House Of Blues Anaheim in Anaheim, CA. While Snot is purposefully keeping the identity of their new vocalist a secret until then, you can hear the mystery man in action below.

Whoever they are is sounds pretty damn good (for at least those few seconds), so this is certainly exciting! Snot's current tour dates for 2025 are:

1/17 Anaheim, CA House Of Blues Anaheim (w/ Adema & Sicksense)
1/18 San Diego, CA Brick By Brick (w/ Adema & Sicksense)
2/08 Santa Barbara, CA SOhO (w/ Seven Hours After Violet & Petmedz)
4/25 Denver, CO HQ
4/26 Colorado Springs, CO The Black Sheep
5/18 Daytona Beach, FL Welcome To Rockville
8/8-10 Kortrijk, BEL Alcatraz
8/14-17 Carhaix, FRA Motocultor Festival
